channel.title: My Little Python Meeting
channel.description: News and information about My Little Python Day.

item.title: Little Python Meeting Announced
item.description:
You create news using nikola new_post. This will create a RSS feed, which I suggest you mirror into twitter using something like twitterfeed.com

That way you can use the nice twitter widgets in your front page and display the news there.

You can edit and remove posts by just editing the contents of posts/. For example, it is probably a very good idea to remove this one before launching your event!
